name: id
description: contact id

name: activity_new
description: category of the company's activity

name: campaign_disc_ele
description: code of the electricity campaign the customer last subscribed to

name: channel_sales
description: code of the sales channel

name: cons_12m
description: electricity consumption of the past 12 months

name: cons_gas_12m
description: gas consumption of the past 12 months

name: cons_last_month
description: electricity consumption of the last month

name: date_activ
description: date of activation of the contract

name: date_end
description: registered date of the end of the contract

name: date_first_activ
description: date of first contract of the client

name: date_modif_prod
description: date of last modification of the product

name: date_renewal
description: date of the next contract renewal

name: forecast_base_bill_ele
description: forecasted electricity bill baseline for next month

name: forecast_base_bill_year
description: forecasted electricity bill baseline for calendar year

name: forecast_bill_12m
description: forecasted electricity bill baseline for 12 months

name: forecast_cons
description: forecasted electricity consumption for next month

name: forecast_cons_12m
description: forecasted electricity consumption for next 12 months

name: forecast_cons_year
description: forecasted electricity consumption for next calendar year

name: forecast_discount_energy
description: forecasted value of current discount

name: forecast_meter_rent_12m
description: forecasted bill of meter rental for the next 12 months

name: forecast_price_energy_p1
description: forecasted energy price for 1st period

name: forecast_price_energy_p2
description: forecasted energy price for 2nd period

name: forecast_price_pow_p1
description: forecasted power price for 1st period

name: has_gas
description: indicated if client is also a gas client

name: imp_cons
description: current paid consumption

name: margin_gross_pow_ele
description: gross margin on power subscription

name: margin_net_pow_ele
description: net margin on power subscription

name: nb_prod_act
description: number of active products and services

name: net_margin
description: total net margin

name: num_years_antig
description: antiquity of the client (in number of years)

name: origin_up
description: code of the electricity campaign the customer first subscribed to

name: pow_max
description: subscribed power

name: price_date
description: reference date

name: price_p1_var
description: price of energy for the 1st period

name: price_p2_var
description: price of energy for the 2nd period

name: price_p3_var
description: price of energy for the 3rd period

name: price_p1_fix
description: price of power for the 1st period

name: price_p2_fix
description: price of power for the 2nd period

name: price_p3_fix
description: price of power for the 3rd period

name: churn
description: has the client churned over the next 3 months
